data.title: Digit Vol 15 Issue 04 April 2015 Server
data.meta_description: Digit Vol 15 Issue 04 April 2015 Server - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses how technology has permeated our lives and how it could lead to issues with boredom and cognitive decline if taken to an extreme. It notes that with so much technology around to entertain us, our minds rarely get any idle time which some research has linked to increased creativity. However, constantly relying on technology to solve problems or entertain us could lead to weaker cognitive abilities as skills are used less. It also discusses how technology has become superficial with focus on looks rather than understanding, and how a deeper understanding is needed to avoid potential negative impacts on human ingenuity and problem solving in the future.
